trans-unit.source: Describes the requirements for a successful deployment of ATA in your environment
trans-unit.target: Describes the requirements for a successful deployment of ATA in your environment

trans-unit.source: This article describes the requirements for a successful deployment of ATA in your environment.
trans-unit.target: This article describes the requirements for a successful deployment of ATA in your environment.

trans-unit.source: For information on how to plan resources and capacity, see [ATA capacity planning](ata-capacity-planning.md).
trans-unit.target: For information on how to plan resources and capacity, see [ATA capacity planning](ata-capacity-planning.md).

trans-unit.source: ATA is comprised of the ATA Center, the ATA Gateway and/or the ATA Lightweight Gateway.
trans-unit.target: ATA is comprised of the ATA Center, the ATA Gateway and/or the ATA Lightweight Gateway.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the ATA components, see [ATA architecture](ata-architecture.md).
trans-unit.target: For more information about the ATA components, see [ATA architecture](ata-architecture.md).

trans-unit.source: The ATA System works on active directory forest boundary and supports Forest Functional Level (FFL) of Windows 2003 and above.
trans-unit.target: The ATA System works on active directory forest boundary and supports Forest Functional Level (FFL) of Windows 2003 and above.

trans-unit.source: [Before you start](#before-you-start): This section lists information you should gather and accounts and network entities you should have before starting ATA installation.
trans-unit.target: [Before you start](#before-you-start): This section lists information you should gather and accounts and network entities you should have before starting ATA installation.

trans-unit.source: [ATA Center](#ata-center-requirements): This section lists ATA Center hardware, software requirements as well as settings you need to configure on your ATA Center server.
trans-unit.target: [ATA Center](#ata-center-requirements): This section lists ATA Center hardware, software requirements as well as settings you need to configure on your ATA Center server.

trans-unit.source: [ATA Gateway](#ata-gateway-requirements): This section lists ATA Gateway hardware, software requirements as well as settings you need to configure on your ATA Gateway servers.
trans-unit.target: [ATA Gateway](#ata-gateway-requirements): This section lists ATA Gateway hardware, software requirements as well as settings you need to configure on your ATA Gateway servers.

trans-unit.source: [ATA Lightweight Gateway](#ata-lightweight-gateway-requirements): This section lists ATA Lightweight Gateway hardware, and software requirements.
trans-unit.target: [ATA Lightweight Gateway](#ata-lightweight-gateway-requirements): This section lists ATA Lightweight Gateway hardware, and software requirements.

trans-unit.source: [ATA Console](#ata-console): This section lists browser requirements for running the ATA Console.
trans-unit.target: [ATA Console](#ata-console): This section lists browser requirements for running the ATA Console.

trans-unit.source: This section lists information you should gather and accounts and network entities you should have before starting ATA installation.
trans-unit.target: This section lists information you should gather and accounts and network entities you should have before starting ATA installation.

trans-unit.source: User account and password with read access to all objects in the domains that will be monitored.
trans-unit.target: User account and password with read access to all objects in the domains that will be monitored.

trans-unit.source: If you have set custom ACLs on various Organizational Units (OU) in your domain, make sure that the selected user has read permissions to those OUs.
trans-unit.target: If you have set custom ACLs on various Organizational Units (OU) in your domain, make sure that the selected user has read permissions to those OUs.

trans-unit.source: Make sure that Message Analyzer and WireShark are not installed on the ATA Gateway.
trans-unit.target: Make sure that Message Analyzer and WireShark are not installed on the ATA Gateway.

trans-unit.source: Recommended: User should have read only permissions on the Deleted Objects container.
trans-unit.target: Recommended: User should have read only permissions on the Deleted Objects container.

trans-unit.source: This will allow ATA to detect bulk deletion of objects in the domain.
trans-unit.target: This will allow ATA to detect bulk deletion of objects in the domain.

trans-unit.source: For information about configuring read only permissions on the Deleted Objects container, see the **Changing permissions on a deleted object container** section in the [View or Set Permissions on a Directory Object](https://technet.microsoft.com/library/cc816824%28v=ws.10%29.aspx) topic.
trans-unit.target: For information about configuring read only permissions on the Deleted Objects container, see the **Changing permissions on a deleted object container** section in the [View or Set Permissions on a Directory Object](https://technet.microsoft.com/library/cc816824%28v=ws.10%29.aspx) topic.

trans-unit.source: Optional: A user account of a user who has no network activities.
trans-unit.target: Optional: A user account of a user who has no network activities.

trans-unit.source: This account will be configured as the ATA Honeytoken user.
trans-unit.target: This account will be configured as the ATA Honeytoken user.

trans-unit.source: To configure the Honeytoken user you will need the SID of the user account, not the username.
trans-unit.target: To configure the Honeytoken user you will need the SID of the user account, not the username.

trans-unit.source: For more information see [Working with ATA Detection Settings](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/advanced-threat-analytics/deploy-use/working-with-detection-settings) topic.
trans-unit.target: For more information see [Working with ATA Detection Settings](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/advanced-threat-analytics/deploy-use/working-with-detection-settings) topic.

trans-unit.source: Optional: In addition to collecting and analyzing network traffic to and from the domain controllers, ATA can use Windows event 4776 to further enhance ATA Pass-the-Hash detection.
trans-unit.target: Optional: In addition to collecting and analyzing network traffic to and from the domain controllers, ATA can use Windows event 4776 to further enhance ATA Pass-the-Hash detection.

trans-unit.source: This can be received from your SIEM or by setting Windows Event Forwarding from your domain controller.
trans-unit.target: This can be received from your SIEM or by setting Windows Event Forwarding from your domain controller.

trans-unit.source: Events collected provide ATA with additional information that is not available via the domain controller network traffic.
trans-unit.target: Events collected provide ATA with additional information that is not available via the domain controller network traffic.

trans-unit.source: This section lists the requirements for the ATA Center.
trans-unit.target: This section lists the requirements for the ATA Center.

trans-unit.source: The ATA Center supports installation on a server running Windows Server 2012 R2 or Windows Server 2016.
trans-unit.target: The ATA Center supports installation on a server running Windows Server 2012 R2 or Windows Server 2016.

trans-unit.source: The ATA Center can be installed on a server that is a member of a domain or workgroup.
trans-unit.target: The ATA Center can be installed on a server that is a member of a domain or workgroup.

trans-unit.source: Before installing ATA Center running Windows 2012 R2, confirm that the following update has been installed: [KB2919355](https://support.microsoft.com/kb/2919355/).
trans-unit.target: Before installing ATA Center running Windows 2012 R2, confirm that the following update has been installed: [KB2919355](https://support.microsoft.com/kb/2919355/).

trans-unit.source: You can check by running the following Windows PowerShell cmdlet: `[Get-HotFix -Id kb2919355]`.
trans-unit.target: You can check by running the following Windows PowerShell cmdlet: `[Get-HotFix -Id kb2919355]`.

trans-unit.source: Installation of the ATA Center as a virtual machine is supported.
trans-unit.target: Installation of the ATA Center as a virtual machine is supported.

trans-unit.source: When running as a virtual machine dynamic memory or any other memory ballooning feature is not supported.
trans-unit.target: When running as a virtual machine dynamic memory or any other memory ballooning feature is not supported.

trans-unit.source: If you run the ATA Center as a virtual machine, shut down the server before creating a new checkpoint to avoid potential database corruption.
trans-unit.target: If you run the ATA Center as a virtual machine, shut down the server before creating a new checkpoint to avoid potential database corruption.

trans-unit.source: When working on a physical server, the ATA database necessitates that you **disable** Non-uniform memory access (NUMA) in the BIOS.
trans-unit.target: When working on a physical server, the ATA database necessitates that you **disable** Non-uniform memory access (NUMA) in the BIOS.

trans-unit.source: Your system may refer to NUMA as Node Interleaving, in which case you will have to **enable** Node Interleaving in order to disable NUMA.
trans-unit.target: Your system may refer to NUMA as Node Interleaving, in which case you will have to **enable** Node Interleaving in order to disable NUMA.

trans-unit.source: See your BIOS documentation for more information.
trans-unit.target: See your BIOS documentation for more information.

trans-unit.source: Note that this is not relevant when the ATA Center is running on a virtual server.
trans-unit.target: Note that this is not relevant when the ATA Center is running on a virtual server.

trans-unit.source: For optimal performance, set the **Power Option** of the ATA Center to **High Performance**.
trans-unit.target: For optimal performance, set the **Power Option** of the ATA Center to **High Performance**.

trans-unit.source: The number of domain controllers you are monitoring and the load on each of the domain controllers dictates the server specifications needed see [ATA capacity planning](ata-capacity-planning.md) for more details.
trans-unit.target: The number of domain controllers you are monitoring and the load on each of the domain controllers dictates the server specifications needed see [ATA capacity planning](ata-capacity-planning.md) for more details.

trans-unit.source: The ATA Center server, the ATA Gateway servers and the domain controllers must have time synchronized to within 5 minutes of each other.
trans-unit.target: The ATA Center server, the ATA Gateway servers and the domain controllers must have time synchronized to within 5 minutes of each other.

trans-unit.source: At least one network adapter (if using physical server in VLAN environment, it is recommended to use two network adapters)
trans-unit.target: At least one network adapter (if using physical server in VLAN environment, it is recommended to use two network adapters)

trans-unit.source: Two IP addresses (recommended but not required)
trans-unit.target: Two IP addresses (recommended but not required)

trans-unit.source: Communication between the ATA Center and the ATA Gateway is encrypted using SSL on port 443.
trans-unit.target: Communication between the ATA Center and the ATA Gateway is encrypted using SSL on port 443.

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the ATA Console is also using SSL on port 443.
trans-unit.target: Additionally, the ATA Console is also using SSL on port 443.

trans-unit.source: The ATA Center service will bind port 443 to the first IP address and ATA Console will bind port 443 to the second IP address.
trans-unit.target: The ATA Center service will bind port 443 to the first IP address and ATA Console will bind port 443 to the second IP address.

trans-unit.source: A single IP address with two different ports can be used, but two IP addresses are recommended.
trans-unit.target: A single IP address with two different ports can be used, but two IP addresses are recommended.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the minimum ports that have to be opened for the ATA Center to work properly.
trans-unit.target: The following table lists the minimum ports that have to be opened for the ATA Center to work properly.

trans-unit.source: In this table, IP address 1 is bound to the ATA Center service and IP address 2 is bound to the ATA Console:
trans-unit.target: In this table, IP address 1 is bound to the ATA Center service and IP address 2 is bound to the ATA Console:

trans-unit.source: Make sure the ATA Center has access to your CRL distribution point.
trans-unit.target: Make sure the ATA Center has access to your CRL distribution point.

trans-unit.source: If the ATA Gateways don't have Internet access, follow [the procedure to manually import a CRL](https://technet.microsoft.com/library/aa996972%28v=exchg.65%29.aspx), taking care to install the all the CRL distribution points for the whole chain.
trans-unit.target: If the ATA Gateways don't have Internet access, follow [the procedure to manually import a CRL](https://technet.microsoft.com/library/aa996972%28v=exchg.65%29.aspx), taking care to install the all the CRL distribution points for the whole chain.

trans-unit.source: To ease the installation of the ATA Center, you can install self-signed certificates during the installation of the ATA Center.
trans-unit.target: To ease the installation of the ATA Center, you can install self-signed certificates during the installation of the ATA Center.

trans-unit.source: Post deployment you can replace the self-signed with a certificate from an internal Certification Authority to be used by the ATA Gateway.
trans-unit.target: Post deployment you can replace the self-signed with a certificate from an internal Certification Authority to be used by the ATA Gateway.

trans-unit.source: The certificate's Provider Type must be Cryptographic Service Provider (CSP).
trans-unit.target: The certificate's Provider Type must be Cryptographic Service Provider (CSP).

trans-unit.source: Using of automatic certificate renewal is not supported.
trans-unit.target: Using of automatic certificate renewal is not supported.

trans-unit.source: If you are going to access the ATA Console from other computers, ensure that those computers trust the certificate being used by ATA Center otherwise you will get a warning page that there is a problem with the website's security certificate before getting to the log in page.
trans-unit.target: If you are going to access the ATA Console from other computers, ensure that those computers trust the certificate being used by ATA Center otherwise you will get a warning page that there is a problem with the website's security certificate before getting to the log in page.

trans-unit.source: This section lists the requirements for the ATA Gateway.
trans-unit.target: This section lists the requirements for the ATA Gateway.

trans-unit.source: The ATA Gateway supports installation on a server running Windows Server 2012 R2 or Windows Server 2016 (Include server core).
trans-unit.target: The ATA Gateway supports installation on a server running Windows Server 2012 R2 or Windows Server 2016 (Include server core).

trans-unit.source: The ATA Gateway can be installed on a server that is a member of a domain or workgroup.
trans-unit.target: The ATA Gateway can be installed on a server that is a member of a domain or workgroup.

trans-unit.source: The ATA Gateway can be used to monitor Domain Controllers with Domain Functional Level of Windows 2003 and above.
trans-unit.target: The ATA Gateway can be used to monitor Domain Controllers with Domain Functional Level of Windows 2003 and above.

trans-unit.source: Before installing ATA Gateway running Windows 2012 R2, confirm that the following update has been installed: [KB2919355](https://support.microsoft.com/kb/2919355/).
trans-unit.target: Before installing ATA Gateway running Windows 2012 R2, confirm that the following update has been installed: [KB2919355](https://support.microsoft.com/kb/2919355/).

trans-unit.source: You can check by running the following Windows PowerShell cmdlet: `[Get-HotFix -Id kb2919355]`.
trans-unit.target: You can check by running the following Windows PowerShell cmdlet: `[Get-HotFix -Id kb2919355]`.

trans-unit.source: For information on using virtual machines with the ATA Gateway, see [Configure port mirroring](/advanced-threat-analytics/deploy-use/configure-port-mirroring).
trans-unit.target: For information on using virtual machines with the ATA Gateway, see [Configure port mirroring](/advanced-threat-analytics/deploy-use/configure-port-mirroring).

trans-unit.source: For optimal performance, set the **Power Option** of the ATA Gateway to **High Performance**.
trans-unit.target: For optimal performance, set the **Power Option** of the ATA Gateway to **High Performance**.

trans-unit.source: An ATA Gateway can support monitoring multiple domain controllers, depending on the amount of network traffic to and from the domain controllers.
trans-unit.target: An ATA Gateway can support monitoring multiple domain controllers, depending on the amount of network traffic to and from the domain controllers.

trans-unit.source: When running as a virtual machine dynamic memory or any other memory ballooning feature is not supported.
trans-unit.target: When running as a virtual machine dynamic memory or any other memory ballooning feature is not supported.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the ATA Gateway hardware requirements see [ATA capacity planning](ata-capacity-planning.md).
trans-unit.target: For more information about the ATA Gateway hardware requirements see [ATA capacity planning](ata-capacity-planning.md).

trans-unit.source: The ATA Center server, the ATA Gateway servers and the domain controllers must have time synchronized to within 5 minutes of each other.
trans-unit.target: The ATA Center server, the ATA Gateway servers and the domain controllers must have time synchronized to within 5 minutes of each other.

trans-unit.source: The ATA Gateway requires at least one Management adapter and at least one Capture adapter:
trans-unit.target: The ATA Gateway requires at least one Management adapter and at least one Capture adapter:

trans-unit.source: **Management adapter** - will be used for communications on your corporate network.
trans-unit.target: **Management adapter** - will be used for communications on your corporate network.

trans-unit.source: This adapter should be configured with the following:
trans-unit.target: This adapter should be configured with the following:

trans-unit.source: Static IP address including default gateway
trans-unit.target: Static IP address including default gateway

trans-unit.source: The **DNS suffix for this connection** should be the DNS name of the domain for each domain being monitored.
trans-unit.target: The **DNS suffix for this connection** should be the DNS name of the domain for each domain being monitored.

trans-unit.source: Configure DNS suffix in advanced TCP/IP settings
trans-unit.target: Configure DNS suffix in advanced TCP/IP settings

trans-unit.source: If the ATA Gateway is a member of the domain, this may be configured automatically.
trans-unit.target: If the ATA Gateway is a member of the domain, this may be configured automatically.

trans-unit.source: **Capture adapter** - will be used to capture traffic to and from the domain controllers.
trans-unit.target: **Capture adapter** - will be used to capture traffic to and from the domain controllers.

trans-unit.source: Configure port mirroring for the capture adapter as the destination of the domain controller network traffic.
trans-unit.target: Configure port mirroring for the capture adapter as the destination of the domain controller network traffic.

trans-unit.source: Typically, you will need to work with the networking or virtualization team to configure port mirroring.
trans-unit.target: Typically, you will need to work with the networking or virtualization team to configure port mirroring.

trans-unit.source: Configure a static non-routable IP address for your environment with no default gateway and no DNS server addresses.
trans-unit.target: Configure a static non-routable IP address for your environment with no default gateway and no DNS server addresses.

trans-unit.source: This will ensure that the capture network adapter can capture the maximum amount of traffic and that the management network adapter is used to send and receive the required network traffic.
trans-unit.target: This will ensure that the capture network adapter can capture the maximum amount of traffic and that the management network adapter is used to send and receive the required network traffic.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the minimum ports that the ATA Gateway requires configured on the management adapter:
trans-unit.target: The following table lists the minimum ports that the ATA Gateway requires configured on the management adapter:

trans-unit.source: 443 or as configured for the Center Service
trans-unit.target: 443 or as configured for the Center Service

trans-unit.source: As part of the resolution process done by the ATA Gateway, the following ports need to be open inbound on devices on the network from the ATA Gateways.
trans-unit.target: As part of the resolution process done by the ATA Gateway, the following ports need to be open inbound on devices on the network from the ATA Gateways.

trans-unit.source: Make sure the ATA Center has access to your CRL distribution point.
trans-unit.target: Make sure the ATA Center has access to your CRL distribution point.

trans-unit.source: If the ATA Gateways do not have Internet access, follow the procedure to manually import a CRL, taking care to install the all the CRL distribution points for the whole chain.
trans-unit.target: If the ATA Gateways do not have Internet access, follow the procedure to manually import a CRL, taking care to install the all the CRL distribution points for the whole chain.

trans-unit.source: To ease installation of the ATA Center, you can install self-signed certificates during the installation of the ATA Center.
trans-unit.target: To ease installation of the ATA Center, you can install self-signed certificates during the installation of the ATA Center.

trans-unit.source: Post deployment you can replace the self-signed with a certificate from an internal Certification Authority to be used by the ATA Gateway.
trans-unit.target: Post deployment you can replace the self-signed with a certificate from an internal Certification Authority to be used by the ATA Gateway.

trans-unit.source: The certificate's Provider Type must be Cryptographic Service Provider (CSP).
trans-unit.target: The certificate's Provider Type must be Cryptographic Service Provider (CSP).

trans-unit.source: A certificate supporting **Server Authentication** is required to be installed in the Computer store of the ATA Gateway in the Local Computer store.
trans-unit.target: A certificate supporting **Server Authentication** is required to be installed in the Computer store of the ATA Gateway in the Local Computer store.

trans-unit.source: This certificate must be trusted by the ATA Center.
trans-unit.target: This certificate must be trusted by the ATA Center.

trans-unit.source: This section lists the requirements for the ATA Lightweight Gateway.
trans-unit.target: This section lists the requirements for the ATA Lightweight Gateway.

trans-unit.source: The ATA Lightweight Gateway supports installation on a domain controller running Windows Server 2008 R2 SP1, Windows Server 2012, Windows Server 2012 R2, Windows Server 2016 (include Core but not Nano).
trans-unit.target: The ATA Lightweight Gateway supports installation on a domain controller running Windows Server 2008 R2 SP1, Windows Server 2012, Windows Server 2012 R2, Windows Server 2016 (include Core but not Nano).

trans-unit.source: The domain controller can be a read only domain controller (RODC).
trans-unit.target: The domain controller can be a read only domain controller (RODC).

trans-unit.source: Before installing ATA Lightweight Gateway on a domain controller running Windows Server 2012 R2 SP1, confirm that the following update has been installed: [KB2919355](https://support.microsoft.com/kb/2919355/).
trans-unit.target: Before installing ATA Lightweight Gateway on a domain controller running Windows Server 2012 R2 SP1, confirm that the following update has been installed: [KB2919355](https://support.microsoft.com/kb/2919355/).

trans-unit.source: You can check by running the following Windows PowerShell cmdlet: `[Get-HotFix -Id kb2919355]`.
trans-unit.target: You can check by running the following Windows PowerShell cmdlet: `[Get-HotFix -Id kb2919355]`.

trans-unit.source: The ATA Lightweight Gateway requires a minimum of 2 cores and 6 GB of RAM installed on the domain controller.
trans-unit.target: The ATA Lightweight Gateway requires a minimum of 2 cores and 6 GB of RAM installed on the domain controller.

trans-unit.source: For optimal performance, set the **Power Option** of the ATA Lightweight Gateway to **High Performance**.
trans-unit.target: For optimal performance, set the **Power Option** of the ATA Lightweight Gateway to **High Performance**.

trans-unit.source: The ATA Lightweight Gateway can be deployed on domain controllers of various loads and sizes, depending on the amount of network traffic to and from the domain controllers and the amount of resources installed on that domain controller.
trans-unit.target: The ATA Lightweight Gateway can be deployed on domain controllers of various loads and sizes, depending on the amount of network traffic to and from the domain controllers and the amount of resources installed on that domain controller.

trans-unit.source: When running as a virtual machine dynamic memory or any other memory ballooning feature is not supported.
trans-unit.target: When running as a virtual machine dynamic memory or any other memory ballooning feature is not supported.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the ATA Lightweight Gateway hardware requirements see [ATA capacity planning](ata-capacity-planning.md).
trans-unit.target: For more information about the ATA Lightweight Gateway hardware requirements see [ATA capacity planning](ata-capacity-planning.md).

trans-unit.source: The ATA Center server, the ATA Lightweight Gateway servers and the domain controllers must have time synchronized to within 5 minutes of each other.
trans-unit.target: The ATA Center server, the ATA Lightweight Gateway servers and the domain controllers must have time synchronized to within 5 minutes of each other.

trans-unit.source: The ATA Lightweight Gateway monitors the local traffic on all of the domain controller's network adapters.
trans-unit.target: The ATA Lightweight Gateway monitors the local traffic on all of the domain controller's network adapters.

trans-unit.source: After deployment, you can use the ATA Console if you ever want to modify which network adapters are monitored.
trans-unit.target: After deployment, you can use the ATA Console if you ever want to modify which network adapters are monitored.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the minimum ports that the ATA Lightweight Gateway requires:
trans-unit.target: The following table lists the minimum ports that the ATA Lightweight Gateway requires:

trans-unit.source: 443 or as configured for the Center Service
trans-unit.target: 443 or as configured for the Center Service

trans-unit.source: As part of the resolution process performed by the ATA Lightweight Gateway, the following ports need to be open inbound on devices on the network from the ATA Lightweight Gateways.
trans-unit.target: As part of the resolution process performed by the ATA Lightweight Gateway, the following ports need to be open inbound on devices on the network from the ATA Lightweight Gateways.

trans-unit.source: Make sure the ATA Center has access to your CRL distribution point.
trans-unit.target: Make sure the ATA Center has access to your CRL distribution point.

trans-unit.source: If the ATA Lightweight Gateways don't have Internet access, follow the procedure to manually import a CRL, taking care to install the all the CRL distribution points for the whole chain.
trans-unit.target: If the ATA Lightweight Gateways don't have Internet access, follow the procedure to manually import a CRL, taking care to install the all the CRL distribution points for the whole chain.

trans-unit.source: To ease installation of the ATA Center, you can install self-signed certificates during the installation of the ATA Center.
trans-unit.target: To ease installation of the ATA Center, you can install self-signed certificates during the installation of the ATA Center.

trans-unit.source: Post deployment you can replace the self-signed with a certificate from an internal Certification Authority to be used by the ATA Lightweight Gateway.
trans-unit.target: Post deployment you can replace the self-signed with a certificate from an internal Certification Authority to be used by the ATA Lightweight Gateway.

trans-unit.source: The certificate's Provider Type must be Cryptographic Service Provider (CSP).
trans-unit.target: The certificate's Provider Type must be Cryptographic Service Provider (CSP).

trans-unit.source: A certificate supporting Server Authentication is required to be installed in the Computer store of the ATA Lightweight Gateway in the Local Computer store.
trans-unit.target: A certificate supporting Server Authentication is required to be installed in the Computer store of the ATA Lightweight Gateway in the Local Computer store.

trans-unit.source: This certificate must be trusted by the ATA Center.
trans-unit.target: This certificate must be trusted by the ATA Center.

trans-unit.source: Access to the ATA Console is via a browser, supporting the following:
trans-unit.target: Access to the ATA Console is via a browser, supporting the following:

trans-unit.source: Minimum screen width resolution of 1700 pixels
trans-unit.target: Minimum screen width resolution of 1700 pixels
